snatools 0.0.0.9000

Reference

snatools

snatools

snatools: An R toolkit to bridge graph classes and streamline network analytic workflows.

Class Conversion

Safely convert objects between common network classes.

as_igraph()

Conversion to igraph objects.

as_network()

Conversion to network objects.

Attributes

Obtain network, vertex, and edge attributes in consistent formats.

edg_attrs()

Extract edge attributes.

edg_attr_names()

List edge attribute names.

net_attrs()

Extract graph attributes.

net_attr_names()

List a network/graph's attribute names.

vrt_attrs()

Extract vertex attributes from a graph.

vrt_attr_names()

List vertex attribute names.

Representations

Construct various network representations.

rep_adjacency_matrix()

Build a network's adjacency matrix representation

rep_attr_adj_mat()

Build a graphs's adjacency matrix, using an attribute category in place of vertex names.

rep_edgelist()

Build a networks's edge list representation.

rep_attr_el()

Build a graphs's edge list, using an attribute categories instead of vertex names.

rep_two_mode_matrix()

rep_two_mode_matrix

rep_biadjacency_matrix()

rep_biadjacency_matrix

rep_mixing_matrix()

Build a network/graph's mixing matrix.

Homophily

Procedures addressing homophily and mixing patterns.

ei_index()

E-I Index

ei_index_global()

Global E-I Index

ei_index_global_permute()

E-I Index Permutation Test

rep_mixing_matrix()

Build a network/graph's mixing matrix.

Quadratic Assignment Procedure

qap_cor()

Quadratic Assignment Procedure (Correlation)

Carpentry

Clean network internals to enforce stricter attribute data types and accurate metadata.

clean_graph()

Clean a graph object's internals and standardize attributes.

Visualization

plot_triad_census()

Quickly plot a graph's triad census.

Foreign File Formats

read_ucinet()

Read UCINET's .dl files

Data

florence

Padgett's Florentine Families

monastery

Sampson's Monastery

southern_women

Davis' Southern Women

Operators

%>%

Ceci n'est pas une pipe.

`%==%`

Strict object comparison.

Miscellaneous

Helper functions exported for convenience.

txt_detect() txt_extract() txt_extract_all() txt_replace() txt_replace_all() txt_remove() txt_remove_all() txt_split() txt_trim() txt_squish() txt_to_lower() txt_to_upper() txt_sub() txt_subset() txt_which() txt_to_title()

Text manipulation tools.
